item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-30
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Met Bar Natick (1245 Worcester St, Natick). #
  • Heading downtown to grab some seafood @barkingcrab! Hooray 4 crabs! (The food not the STD) #
  • I'm at Barking Crab (88 Sleeper St, Boston). #
  • I'm at Flour Bakery & Cafe (Fort Point) (12 Farnsworth Street, Boston). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
